Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • game.DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
    Draws all the things that will be displayed on the window UI, players, and map are drawn Draws a server window too
    Author:
    Harrison, Will
